definition: Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: Flow gently, sweet Afton , disturb not her dream.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻地流啊，甜美的埃弗顿河，不要惊扰她的好梦。

sentences.english: I'm an Evertonian so that gives you your answer!
sentences.chinese: 我是一名埃弗顿人，所以这就是给你的答案。

sentences.english: Everton head north without influential midfielder Marouane Fellaini, who serves the second game of a three-match ban.
sentences.chinese: 埃弗顿的中场大将费来尼因为禁赛不能上场。

sentences.english: Everton's best player this season has been Tim Cahill.
sentences.chinese: 埃弗顿本赛季最优秀的球员是卡西尔。

sentences.english: The best memory I have in Liverpool is when we beat Everton at Goodison Park.
sentences.chinese: 在利物浦的最好记忆是在古迪逊公园球场击败埃弗顿。

sentences.english: They've lost three times to Everton this season.
sentences.chinese: 本赛季他们已三次输给埃弗顿队了。

sentences.english: At Everton, the first was a Boulahrouz foul for a penalty.
sentences.chinese: 对阵埃弗顿，第一个球是博拉鲁兹的犯规导致点球。

sentences.english: But Everton's silent west Seder the Derby war will be more splendid.
sentences.chinese: 而与埃弗顿的默西塞德德比大战将更为精彩。

sentences.english: ' and 'Everton are a bunch of cheats'.
sentences.chinese: 和“埃弗顿队是一群骗子”。”

definition: Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
